sentences.english: Airplanes grounded because of the fog have already taken off.
sentences.chinese: 受到大霧影響而停飛的班機已全部復航。

sentences.english: What flights do you have from New York to London tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 明天從紐約飛往倫敦的有哪幾班機？

sentences.english: Twenty-eight flights were diverted to other airports.
sentences.chinese: 廿八班機需要轉飛其它機場。

sentences.english: A plane departs every hour on the hour.
By the way, I don't want a night flight.
sentences.chinese: 隨便提一下，我不要夜航班機。

sentences.english: Keep checking the board to see if his flight has been delayed.
sentences.chinese: 持續查看告示板，看看他的班機是否耽擱了。

sentences.english: Does this flight lie over at great fall on its way to New York City ?
sentences.chinese: 這班機去紐約途中要在大瀑布停留嗎？

sentences.english: The first of the airliners winged westwards and home.
sentences.chinese: 第一架班機向西飛回了家。

sentences.english: Flight 088 for Detroit is boarding now.
sentences.chinese: 飛往底特律的088號班機現在開始登機。

sentences.english: Excuse me, Is this the check-in counter for NW157?
sentences.chinese: 勞駕，這是西北航空公司157班機辦手續的櫃檯嗎？

sentences.english: Is the five-thirty flight from Denver on time?
What are the departure times of flights on Saturdays from Beijing to San Francisc?
sentences.chinese: 週六北京飛往舊金山的班機幾點起飛？

sentences.english: The aircraft was traveling from Tehran to the Armenian capital of Yerevan.
sentences.chinese: 該班機由伊朗首都德黑蘭飛往亞美尼亞首都埃裏溫。

sentences.english: We have flights to Paris every hour.
sentences.chinese: 我們每小時都有去巴黎的班機。

definition: (to take) a turn for the better/to change planes
to set off/to start (on a journey)
to delay/to be held up/to miss (an opportunity)/delay/holdup
jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
